# @antv/g-plugin-html-renderer

Render HTML for g-canvas/svg/webgl.

```js
const p1 = new HTML({
    style: {
        x: 200,
        y: 100,
        html: 'p1',
    },
});
const p2 = new HTML({
    style: {
        x: 400,
        y: 100,
        html: 'p2',
    },
});

// 修改属性
p1.style.x = x1;
p1.style.filter = 'blur(5px)';

// 变换
p1.translate(100, 0);
p1.scale(2);
```
